EmailTemplate.name: 201805_BK_Event_Oshkosh_AirVenture_mih.201808_BK_Event_ThankYou_Oshkosh_AirVentu
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Visiting the BendixKing Pavilion at EAA 2018!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> THANK YOU! Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Thank you for visiting the BendixKing Pavilion in Oshkosh, WI, during EAA 2018.
Stay in the loop with us and you’ll be among the first to learn about the future BendixKing events and products. Please click below to sign up, so you can get all your aircraft up-to-speed.
YES, KEEP ME IN THE LOOP <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]>
We look forward to seeing you again next year!
Thank you,
BendixKing Event Team
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, click on the following link: Unsubscribe <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/o02VZ00q000vhQ0jBXIGdq0]]>
